books.author: by J.D. Robb
books.description: The 51st book of the In Death series. A hitman with possible connections to Eve Dallas’s husband is seen near the scene of a crime.
books.name: SHADOWS IN DEATH

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A failed bank robber holds a group of strangers hostage at an apartment open house.
books.name: ANXIOUS PEOPLE

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: An avalanche tests the bonds of coworkers from a London-based tech startup on a corporate retreat in the French Alps.
books.name: ONE BY ONE

books.author: by Louise Penny
books.description: The 16th book in the Chief Inspector Gamache series. When his billionaire godfather is attacked, Gamache uncovers secrets hidden throughout Paris.
books.name: ALL THE DEVILS ARE HERE

books.author: by Brit Bennett
books.description: The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.
books.name: THE VANISHING HALF

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Ann Cleeves
books.description: The ninth book in the Vera Stanhope series. An abandoned toddler, a dead woman and a blizzard complicate the holidays in the Northumberland countryside.
books.name: THE DARKEST EVENING

books.author: by Jonathan Cahn
books.description: Nouriel, Ana Goren and a figure known as "the prophet" return as revelations are unlocked.
books.name: THE HARBINGER II

books.author: by Lucy Foley
books.description: A wedding between a TV star and a magazine publisher on an island off the coast of Ireland turns deadly.
books.name: THE GUEST LIST

books.author: by Carl Hiaasen
books.description: A dead dowager, hungry pythons and occupants of the winter White House shake up the Palm Beach charity ball season.
books.name: SQUEEZE ME

books.author: by Elena Ferrante
books.description: In this coming-of-age story, Giovanna seeks her true reflection in two kindred cities.
books.name: THE LYING LIFE OF ADULTS

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: Arden Maxwell returns home to uncover the truth about her father’s involvement in a heist that went wrong 20 years ago.
books.name: THICK AS THIEVES

books.author: by Yaa Gyasi
books.description: A Ph.D. candidate in neuroscience looks to the hard sciences and her childhood faith to potentially help her grieving Ghanaian immigrant family.
books.name: TRANSCENDENT KINGDOM

books.author: by Kiley Reid
books.description: Tumult ensues when Alix Chamberlain’s babysitter is mistakenly accused of kidnapping her charge.
books.name: SUCH A FUN AGE

books.author: by Jeanine Cummins
books.description: A bookseller flees Mexico for the United States with her son while pursued by the head of a drug cartel.
books.name: AMERICAN DIRT
